record.jsxtip: fires before a context menu is shown after a right-click event on the header cell

record.jsxreturntext: use this field to override the default menu with an instance of jsx3.gui.Menu

record.jsxtip: fires when the item has just been removed from the DOM

record.jsxtext: JSX Object that is in the process of being destroyed
the parent of this JSX Object before it was removed from the DOM tree
